languages.text:
The Signet of the Inquisition grants special privileges:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Momentum{/g} increases by +20.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects are removed from all allies in a 5-cell radius.</indent>
-<indent=5%>All allies in a 5-cell radius gain +<u>(wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g} / 7)</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.</indent>

-<indent=5%>All allies in a 5-cell radius gain +<u>(wearer's Persuasion / 7)</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}</indent>

-<indent=5%>All allies in a 5-cell radius gain +<u>(wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g} / 7)</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.</indent>

languages.text:
审判庭的印记会赐予以下效果：
- <indent=5%>+20{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}。</indent>
- <indent=5%>移除5格内所有盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}效果。</indent>
- <indent=5%>5格内所有盟友获得<u>（装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}劝说{/g}/7）</u>点临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。</indent>

-<indent=5%>All allies in a 5-cell radius gain +<u>(wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g} / 7)</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.</indent>

languages.text:
異端審問庁の印章指輪が次の特別な力を与える：
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}+20。</indent>
-<indent=5%>半径5マス以内にいる味方全員の{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}の効果を解除。</indent>
-<indent=5%>半径5マス以内にいる味方全員が+<u>（使用者の説得/7）</u>の一時{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷耐性{/g}を獲得する。</indent>

languages.text:
Das Siegel der Inquisition gewährt spezielle Privilegien:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g} wird um +20 erhöht.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Die Effekte {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxin{/g} werden von allen Verbündeten in einem 5-Felder-Radius entfernt.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Alle Verbündeten in einem 5-Felder-Radius erhalten +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Überredung{/g} des Trägers / 7)</u> temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}.</indent>
languages.original_text:

-<indent=5%>All allies in a 5-cell radius gain +<u>(wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g} / 7)</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.</indent>

languages.text:
La chevalière de l'Inquisition confère des privilèges spéciaux :
-<indent=5%>+20 de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>Les effets {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} sont supprimés sur tous les alliés présents dans un rayon de 5 cases.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Tous les alliés présents dans un rayon de 5 cases bénéficient de +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g} de l'utilisateur / 7)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires.</indent>
languages.original_text:
The Signet of the Inquisition grants special privileges:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Momentum{/g} increases by +20.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects are removed from all allies in a 5-cell radius.</indent>
-<indent=5%>All allies in a 5-cell radius gain +<u>(wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g} / 7)</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.</indent>

traits.locale_text:

- <indent=5%>Tous les alliés présents dans un rayon de 5 cases bénéficient de +<u>(Persuasion de l'utilisateur / 7)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires</indent>

languages.text:
El sello de la Inquisición proporciona privilegios especiales:
-<indent=5%>Aumenta el {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} en +20.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Elimina los efectos de {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} de todos los aliados en un radio de 5 casillas.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Todos los aliados en un radio de 5 casillas ganan +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasión{/g} del portador / 7)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} temporales.</indent>
languages.original_text:
The Signet of the Inquisition grants special privileges:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Momentum{/g} increases by +20.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects are removed from all allies in a 5-cell radius.</indent>
-<indent=5%>All allies in a 5-cell radius gain +<u>(wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g} / 7)</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
El sello de la Inquisición proporciona efectos beneficiosos:
-<indent=5%>Aumenta el {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}ímpetu{/g} en +20</indent>
-<indent=5%>Elimina los efectos de {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} de todos los aliados en un radio de 5 casillas</indent>
-<indent=5%>Todos los aliados en un radio de 5 casillas ganan +<u>(Persuasión del portador / 7)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} temporales</indent>

languages.text:
Перстень Инквизиции дает особые привилегии:
-<indent=5%>+20 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Со всех союзников в радиусе 5 клеток снимаются эффекты {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравления{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Все союзники в радиусе 5 клеток получают +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Убеждение{/g} персонажа / 7)</u> временного {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}.</indent>
languages.original_text:

-<indent=5%>All allies in a 5-cell radius gain +<u>(wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g} / 7)</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.</indent>
